name: Machete
descriptions: Machete is a junior law enforcer in Canterbury Commons in 2277.
She used to fiercely defend Little Lamplight. At the age of 7, she slaughtered a mole rat in the caves with a machete, thus earning her nickname. She has been a bona fide celebrity ever since.

At the age of 16, she was supposed to head to Big Town, but she became lost due to a dust storm and arrived at Canterbury Commons instead. Because of her pride, she refuses to admit she went to the wrong place. Dominic D'Ellsadro felt she had the potential to work as a guard, and after a year of his guidance, she has earned some respect among the residents. She works alongside Dominic as his junior law enforcer. They both keep Canterbury Commons safe from raiders, unwanted creatures, and danger in general.

Machete patrols Canterbury Commons from 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM, eats until 1:00 PM, patrols until 6:00 PM, eats until 7:00 PM, then patrols again until 2:00 AM, after which she goes to bed and wakes up at 8:00 AM.

topics.topic_text: Can I get some directions around town?
I didn't mean to interrupt. I just wanted to say hi.
topics.response_text: Fine, hi, whatever. I'm Machete, and I've got better things to do than talk with you. Scram.

topics.topic_text: I'm new in town. What is this place?
topics.response_text: This is Canterbury Commons, where dirty, old lechers get rid of everything they picked up on the road. Unless it's not treatable, that is.

topics.topic_text: Watch your attitude. It'll get you in trouble.
topics.response_text: Yeah, maybe. But you need one to keep some of those caravaners in line. And to keep them from getting too friendly, if you catch my drift.

topics.topic_text: Did you get your nickname in Lamplight?
topics.response_text: Good guess! I was the toughest defender they ever saw in Lamplight. I earned my nickname fighting off a Mole Rat with a knife big as my arm.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Canterbury Commons?
topics.response_text: This whole place would fall apart if it weren't for Dom and me keeping anyone from causing too much trouble.
What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy?

topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about the AntAgonizer or the Mechanist?
topics.response_text: I know Dom doesn't want me just killing them. He and the Mechanist used to be friends or something.{Angry and sick of them}

conversation.response_text: Can't let our guard down, sir! That's when people cause trouble.
When you find those two costumed idiots, put a bullet in their heads for me.
